message: A complicated question always comes to my mind ,What are the technical , strategic and business considerations should be taken when selecting a platform / framework / technology for a new project ? i wish that can be a profitable discussion

data.message: Indeed it's complicated question... please rephrase it or divide it into 3 or 4 maybe 5 questions :D

for an example you are going to build an e-commerce web application which should be serving 3 connected shops 5000 clients on daily basis and your firm is full of skills and experience in developing for different platforms ( .NET , JAVA , LAMP) how are you going to select platform , frameworks and suitable tools for the job
Maybe the widespread mobile platforms over their relevant frameworks i.e iOS platform over Cocoa framework..etc..
